question_content.description:
### Problem04

When you use the keyword new to create an array, Java reserves sufficient space in memory to store the specified number of elements. This process is called _____(0)\___ _____(1)\___(literally from sec-1.4).

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
